results.name: Square table read by antidiagonals forms a permutation of the natural numbers: T(n,0) = floor(n*x/(x-1))+1, T(n,k+1) = ceiling(x*T(n,k)), where x = sqrt(2), n>=0, k>=0.
comment: First column is A083051, main diagonal is A083052, antidiagonal sums give A083053.
A083050 is the dispersion of the sequence given by floor(1+n*sqrt(2)); for a discussion of dispersions, see A191429.
